name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Indie Leads - Find B2B leads on Twitter for free

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The simplest way to find leads in the indie space.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Chrome Extension to scan any Twitter profile and find any public email associated with it. Be part of the best B2B database of SaaS owners, indie hackers, startup founders and more.
